attributes.action: Abolish medical professional registration fees for a year
attributes.additional_details: During the current covid19 outbreak nurses and doctors are working even harder to protect the public. I think that registration fees should be delayed for a year to show appreciation for their hard work and dedication. This would also reduce the stress and time out into revalidating during a difficult time.
attributes.background: To liaise with the governing bodies NMC and GMC to waver registration fees for one year due to covid19

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307399

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
